summary: After a horse accident, Karen wakes up to find herself in past Britain, close to Camelot, the famous castle of King Arthur.
cast: Keshia Knight Pulliam|Jean Marsh|Rene Auberjonois|Emma Samms|Whip Hubley|Hugo Blick|Bryce Hamnet|Michael Gross|Berlinda Tolbert|Marissa Lindsay|William Nunn|William Brand|Cardew Robinson|Natasha Williams|Bernard McKenna|Camilla Dempster|Jeremy Todd Bohannon
keywords: reference to a connecticut yankee in king arthur's court|backwards time travel|female time traveller|accidental time travel|time travel into the past
title: Una americana en la corte del Rey Arturo
